question: Children today have more responsibilities than the past. Some people think it has positive effects than negative ones while others disagree. Discuss both views and give your own opinion.
text: While it is often argued by some people that youngsters are more responsible in current era, whereas  others take the view that  many young people are more attentive in the old days. My opinion is that it is better to hold many responsibilities in nowadays and this essay will discuss about both views.

On  one side of the argument, there are people who hold the opinion that children grow with less responsibility. The major reason for believing this is that laziness. This is due to  they spend more time with the social media such as  Facebook, Twitter and  Tumbler. Furthermore, it urges them to check their cell phone  frequently and  this leads to lack of helping others. Another reason is that children's are really careless when they do daily activities. Consequently, this will For example, a child aged between 8 to 12 years is less attentive in their work.

Despite the above arguments, I hold the position that young people are more responsible.   Indeed, one reason why I take this position is that they are focused in the field of education. Since, the education system in the  modern era is  highly competitive  and they were facing many difficulties to study. However, it is my opinion that kids show respect to their elders in the family. As a result, the bonding between both are very strong and brings more happiness in the family. To illustrate, the New York Times  publishes an article about the responsibilities of children in younger age, which surge  from the year 2019 to 2020.

In conclusion, while both views are commonly held in society, I believe that youngsters show more responsibility. This is because that education is most important  and in addition with family bonding. Given this situation, it is recommended that government around the world should think about implementing this form of encouragement through the online media.
